attributes.action: Reinstate Claudio Ranieri as Leicester City manager
attributes.additional_details: Leicester city should be stripped of the premier league title and banned from football if he isn't reinstated. Ranieri should have had a job for life sacking him is a reflection of the messed up world we live in. As football fans this decision is damaging to football as a whole and this decision needs to be reversed immediately.  The Queen or Prime Minister needs to intervene to stop this disgraceful injustice. Justice for Ranieri. Ynwa
attributes.background: After leading Leicester city to the only success they have ever had historically winning the premier league title, the club are confused and think they deserve to be a permanent fixture in the premier league, in reality they over achieved and Ranieri was responsible for that miracle.
